item.title: 卖美国 "贸易的真正问题
item.description:
要花很多钱！

【原文：

It costs a lot of money!

】

item.title: 加尔达对冲基金首席投资官称债券市场的财政反叛尚未结束
item.description: Garda Capital Partners 的蒂姆-马格努森（Tim Magnusson）认为，债券市场对华盛顿财政大手大脚的反抗远未结束。【原文：The bond-market revolt against Washington’s fiscal largess is far from over, according to Garda Capital Partners’ Tim Magnusson, who says a rapid increase in yields is likely the only thing that will motivate Congress to rein in the deficit.】

item.title: 银行将为梅赫莱宁发行 10 亿欧元高收益债券
item.description: 一组银行正准备为芬兰医疗保健公司梅希莱宁（Mehiläinen）推出约10亿欧元（11亿美元）的高收益债券销售。【原文：A group of banks are preparing to launch a roughly €1 billion ($1.1 billion) sale of high yield bonds for Finnish health care firm Mehiläinen.】

item.title: 欧洲企业有望实现价值 1000 亿美元的分拆上市
item.description: 许多欧洲公司正在制定业务部门上市计划，总价值超过 1,000 亿美元，这在资本市场活动低迷的情况下成为一个亮点。【原文：A slew of European companies are working on plans to list business units worth more than $100 billion combined, offering a bright spot amid muted capital markets activity.】

item.title: 欧洲债券销售创纪录地突破 1 万亿欧元
item.description: 即使在特朗普政府全面征收关税导致市场短暂关闭之后，欧洲银行家们安排的债务销售额仍以有史以来最快的速度突破了1万亿欧元（1.13万亿美元）。【原文：Debt sales arranged by bankers across Europe have surged past €1 trillion ($1.13 trillion) for the year in the quickest time ever, even after the market briefly shut down following the Trump administration’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 在菲利普斯 66 之战中，埃利奥特首次面临美国代理投票
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）在针对美国公司开展了百余次活动后，首次在本土进行代理投票。【原文：After more than a hundred campaigns targeting US companies, Elliott Investment Management is heading into its first ever proxy vote on home ground.】

item.title: 深度伪造为何无处不在？可以阻止它们吗？
item.description: 互联网上充斥着大量 "深度伪造"（deepfakes —）；利用人工智能工具制作的音频、图片或视频中，人们似乎做了或说了他们没有做的事，出现在他们不在的地方，或改变了他们的外表。有些涉及裸体化，即修改照片以描绘某人未穿衣服的样子。还有一些深度伪造被用来欺骗消费者，或损害政客和其他公众人物的名誉。【原文：The internet is awash in deepfakes — audio, pictures or video made using artificial intelligence tools in which people appear to do or say things they didn’t, be somewhere they weren’t, or that change their appearance. Some involve nudification, where photos are altered to depict someone unclothed. Other deepfakes are deployed to scam consumers, or to damage the reputations of politicians and other people in the public eye.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长温希表示经济可能需要利率的支持
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-翁施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，欧元区经济可能需要 "温和支持性 "的利率水平，以确保在一系列冲击之后通胀率不会低于目标。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch said the euro-zone economy may need interest rates at “mildly supportive” levels to ensure inflation doesn’t fall below target after a series of shocks.】

item.title: 亚马逊的 Zoox 公司在亚特兰大将机器人出租车试验扩展到了竞争对手的草坪上
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）旗下的 Zoox 正在亚特兰大扩大自动驾驶技术的测试范围，进军 Alphabet 公司旗下 Waymo 与优步公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s Zoox is expanding testing of its autonomous driving technology to Atlanta, moving in on a market where Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo is expanding with Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 马斯克表示未来五年将继续担任特斯拉首席执行官
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他将在五年内担任特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Elon Musk said he’s committed to leading Tesla Inc. as chief executive officer in five years’ time, easing the concerns of some investors wary about his level of commitment to the carmaker.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数连升六日逼近牛市后美国股市表现低迷
item.description: 美国股市在连续六个交易日攀升后，周二有所回落，投资者在等待美联储的一系列讲话，并对企业财报进行分析。【原文：US equities edged lower on Tuesday after climbing for six consecutive trading sessions, with investors awaiting a bevy of Federal Reserve speeches and parsing corporate earnings.】

item.title: 美国投资的南非氦气生产商获得华盛顿公司的收购要约
item.description: 一家由美国政府出资 5.4 亿美元的南非氦气公司收到了来自华盛顿特区 ASP Isotopes 公司的收购要约。【原文：A South African helium and gas company, to which the US government has committed $540 million in funding, has received a takeover bid from Washington DC-based ASP Isotopes Inc.】

item.title: First Eagle 计划疯狂收购，以寻求 5000 亿美元的收益
item.description: 由 Genstar Capital 支持的 First Eagle Investments 正计划大举收购，这家投资管理公司希望在未来五年内将资产规模增至 5000 亿美元。【原文：Genstar Capital-backed First Eagle Investments is planning an acquisition spree as the investment manager looks to grow its assets to $500 billion in the next five years.】

item.title: 微软支持的 Builder.ai 将进入破产程序
item.description: 由微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）和卡塔尔投资局（Qatar Investment Authority）支持的人工智能初创公司 Builder.ai 周二在一份声明中表示，将进入破产程序，并指定一名管理人管理公司事务。【原文：Builder.ai, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Microsoft Corp. and the Qatar Investment Authority, will go into insolvency proceedings and appoint an administrator to manage the company’s affairs, it said in a statement Tuesday.】

item.title: 尼日利亚在 "不确定性加剧 "的情况下再次维持利率不变
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行维持利率不变，等待更多数据来确定通胀前景，并等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战引发的动荡平息。【原文：The Central Bank of Nigeria left interest rates unchanged as it awaits more data to determine the inflation outlook and for the turbulence spawned by US President Donald Trump’s trade war to settle.】

item.title: 白宫发言人米兰否认关税上调带来的通胀风险
item.description: 白宫首席经济学家驳斥了增加关税将对美国通胀产生持久影响的观点，并指出利率有可能回落到科维德事件前的水平。【原文：The White House’s chief economist dismissed the idea that tariff increases will have a lasting impact on US inflation, and cited the potential for interest rates to get back down to pre-Covid levels.】

item.title: 蓝钻基金四月业绩创历年最差，受关税影响最大
item.description: 瑞士对冲基金蓝钻资产管理公司（Blue Diamond Asset Management）4 月份的月度业绩创下历史最差纪录，尽管该公司已从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税计划引发的损失中部分挽回了损失。【原文：Swiss hedge fund Blue Diamond Asset Management posted its worst ever monthly result in April even after staging a partial recovery from losses triggered by US President Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: 据说西班牙电信正在研究提高巴西光纤部门的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）正在考虑增持其在巴西拥有的一家光纤宽带合资企业的股份。【原文：Telefonica SA is weighing increasing its stake in a fiber-optic broadband venture it owns in Brazil, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能正在加速发展，而我们还没准备好
item.description:
经济和社会影响可能是巨大的。【原文：

The economic and societal impact could be massive.

】

item.title: 加拿大通胀因碳税结束而降至 9 月以来最慢
item.description: 由于取消了消费碳税和油价下跌，加拿大的通胀率降至 9 月份以来最慢。【原文：Canadian inflation eased to its slowest pace since September on the elimination of the consumer carbon tax and lower oil prices.】

item.title: 卡塔尔首个液化天然气扩建项目将于 2026 年年中开始货运
item.description: 卡塔尔表示，它将在明年年中开始从其首个国内扩建项目中出口液化天然气，从而明确了人们密切关注的运营开始时间。【原文：Qatar said it will start exporting liquefied natural gas from its first domestic expansion project by the middle of next year, clarifying a closely watched timeframe for when operations will begin.】

item.title: 零售经纪人利用私人房间避开市场巨头
item.description: 在残酷的美国股票交易世界里，一些小公司想出了一个办法，避开那些主导股票买卖业务的巨型高速做市商。【原文：In the cut-throat world of US stock trading, some smaller players have devised a tactic to sidestep the giant high-speed market makers who have come to dominate the business of buying and selling shares.】

item.title: 前美国全国广播公司主持人查克-托德计划与初创公司 Noosphere 合作推出在线节目
item.description: 查克-托德（Chuck Todd）是美国全国广播公司（NBC）每周新闻节目《会见新闻界》（Meet the Press）的前主持人，他将与媒体初创公司 Noosphere 合作推出一个基于应用程序的新节目。【原文：Chuck Todd, the former moderator of NBC’s weekly news program Meet the Press, is launching a new app-based show with media startup Noosphere.】

item.title: 走进首个星际之门人工智能数据中心
item.description:
OpenAI、甲骨文和软银希望德克萨斯州的网站成为全美众多网站中的第一个。【原文：

OpenAI, Oracle and SoftBank hope that the site in Texas is the first of many across the US.

】

item.title: 关税导致的美元困境助推第一季度盈利增长
item.description: 关税出乎意料地使美元贬值，进而刺激了企业盈利，这是北美第一季度财报季中为数不多的亮点之一。【原文：Tariffs unexpectedly devaluing the US dollar — and in turn boosting corporate earnings — was one of the few bright spots of the first-quarter earnings season in North America.】

item.title: 马蒂-弗里德森说，垃圾债券的风险回报不够高
item.description: 垃圾债券大师马蒂-弗里德森（Marty Fridson）警告说，本月的反弹将公司债收益率压低到了不足以覆盖风险的水平。【原文：This month’s rally crushed corporate debt yields to a level that does not adequately cover the risk, warns junk bond guru Marty Fridson.】

item.title: Nik Storonsky 的人工智能风险投资公司为初创企业融资 2.5 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁尼-斯托龙斯基（Nik Storonsky）的人工智能风险投资公司完成了一轮 2.5 亿美元的融资，该公司正加紧寻找新的初创企业进行投资。【原文：Billionaire Nik Storonsky’s artificial intelligence-focused venture capital firm has completed a funding round of $250 million as it steps up its hunt for fresh startups for investment.】

item.title: 印度计划斥资 100 亿美元打造国产油轮舰队
item.description: 印度计划斥资8500亿卢比（100亿美元）购买112艘原油运输船，直至2040年。【原文：India plans to spend 850 billion rupees ($10 billion) to purchase 112 crude carriers through 2040, people familiar with the matter said, as the world’s third-biggest importer of oil seeks to have its own fleet to secure supplies.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为经济衰退风险减弱，银行并购业务回暖
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师表示，随着经济衰退担忧的消退和监管格局的不断变化，美国银行业的并购活动将在今年下半年加快步伐。【原文：Mergers and acquisitions in the US banking sector are set to pick up pace in the second half of the year as recession fears recede and the regulatory landscape continues to shift, according to analysts at Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 特朗普时代的欧洲碳交易开放边界
item.description:
连接英国和欧盟市场的协议加强了双方在美国转向的背景下实现净零排放的承诺。【原文：

The deal linking UK and EU markets reinforces their commitment to net zero amid America’s pivot.

】
